name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Basics of fluid flow relevant to aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Airfoil and Lift Theory
lessons.description: Principles of lift and how airfoils work.

lessons.name: Boundary Layers
lessons.description: Study of boundary layers and their impact on flight.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Behavior and equations governing subsonic flow.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow and Shock Waves
lessons.description: Mach number, shocks, and expansion fans.

lessons.name: Compressibility Effects
lessons.description: Influence of compressibility on flow behavior.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Thermodynamics of High-Speed Flight
lessons.description: Thermal effects at high Mach numbers.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Materials and design strategies for thermal protection.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Modeling
lessons.description: Modeling heat transfer during atmospheric entry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Requirements
lessons.description: Load and stress considerations in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Materials for Space
lessons.description: Material properties and selection criteria.

lessons.name: Structural Testing
lessons.description: Testing methods for validating structural integrity.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Orbital Elements
lessons.description: Describing and analyzing orbits.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfers
lessons.description: Hohmann transfers and inclination changes.

lessons.name: Interplanetary Trajectories
lessons.description: Planning trajectories to other celestial bodies.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power and Thermal Systems
lessons.description: Managing energy and heat on a spacecraft.

lessons.name: Attitude and Orbit Control
lessons.description: Maintaining and adjusting spacecraft orientation and trajectory.

lessons.name: System Integration
lessons.description: Integrating subsystems into a functional spacecraft.

name: Hydrocarbons and Functional Groups
description: Introduction to the structure and reactivity of hydrocarbons and common organic functional groups.

lessons.name: Structure of Alkanes and Alkenes
lessons.description: Study of straight-chain, branched, and cyclic hydrocarbons.

lessons.name: Functional Groups Overview
lessons.description: Introduction to alcohols, ethers, carbonyls, and more.

lessons.name: Nomenclature of Organic Compounds
lessons.description: IUPAC naming rules for organic molecules.

name: Stereochemistry and Reaction Mechanisms
description: Exploration of molecular geometry, chirality, and the fundamentals of reaction pathways.

lessons.name: Chirality and Isomerism
lessons.description: Understanding enantiomers, diastereomers, and stereocenters.

lessons.name: Reaction Types
lessons.description: Addition, substitution, and elimination reactions.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Detailed mechanism examples including SN1, SN2, E1, and E2.

name: Spectroscopy and Synthesis
description: Techniques for identifying and synthesizing organic compounds.

lessons.name: Infrared and NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Use of IR and NMR to identify functional groups and molecular structure.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Molecular mass analysis and fragmentation patterns.

lessons.name: Organic Synthesis Strategies
lessons.description: Design of synthetic pathways for complex molecules.

name: Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
description: Overview of key principles and classification of inorganic compounds.

lessons.name: Atomic Structure and Periodicity
lessons.description: Periodic trends and electron configurations.

lessons.name: Types of Inorganic Compounds
lessons.description: Salts, oxides, and acids and bases.

lessons.name: Acid-Base Theories
lessons.description: Lewis and Brønsted-Lowry acid-base theories.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Study of coordination compounds, ligands, and bonding theories.

lessons.name: Coordination Complexes
lessons.description: Formation and structure of metal-ligand complexes.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Explaining color and magnetism of transition metal complexes.

lessons.name: Isomerism in Coordination Compounds
lessons.description: Structural and stereoisomerism in metal complexes.

name: Inorganic Reaction Mechanisms
description: Exploration of how inorganic reactions occur and their kinetics.

lessons.name: Ligand Substitution Reactions
lessons.description: Mechanisms and rate laws.

lessons.name: Redox Reactions in Inorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Electron transfer reactions and electrochemistry.

lessons.name: Catalysis in Inorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis.

name: Thermodynamics and Equilibrium
description: Introduction to the laws of thermodynamics and chemical equilibrium.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: First, Second, and Third Laws and their implications.

lessons.name: Gibbs Free Energy
lessons.description: Predicting spontaneity and equilibrium.

lessons.name: Phase Equilibria
lessons.description: Phase diagrams and Le Chatelier’s Principle.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Study of reaction rates and the factors that affect them.

lessons.name: Rate Laws and Reaction Order
lessons.description: Determining and using rate laws.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Elementary steps and reaction pathways.

lessons.name: Catalysis and Activation Energy
lessons.description: Energy profiles and enzyme kinetics.

name: Quantum Chemistry and Spectroscopy
description: Application of quantum theory to chemical systems and spectroscopic analysis.

lessons.name: Principles of Quantum Mechanics
lessons.description: Wave functions, orbitals, and quantization.

lessons.name: Electronic Structure of Atoms
lessons.description: Atomic models and electron configuration.

lessons.name: UV-Vis and IR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Analyzing molecular structure via light absorption.

name: Elvish Languages
description: Study of Sindarin and Quenya grammar and script.

lessons.name: Sindarin Syntax and Vocabulary
lessons.description: Common phrases, sentence structure, and grammar.

lessons.name: Quenya Grammar and Script
lessons.description: Formal structure, cases, and Tengwar writing.

lessons.name: Translating Elvish Texts
lessons.description: Practice with translating Elvish inscriptions.

name: Dwarvish and Black Speech
description: Understanding Khuzdul and the Black Speech of Mordor.

lessons.name: Khuzdul Basics
lessons.description: Phonology, structure, and usage among Dwarves.

lessons.name: The Black Speech of Mordor
lessons.description: Grammar and historical usage.

lessons.name: Runes and Writing Systems
lessons.description: Cirth and other ancient scripts of Middle-earth.

name: Language and Culture in Middle-earth
description: Role of language in defining culture and identity in Tolkien's world.

lessons.name: Philological Roots
lessons.description: Language invention and etymological influences.

lessons.name: Cultural Context of Speech
lessons.description: How language reflects Elvish, Dwarvish, and human values.

lessons.name: Evolution of Languages
lessons.description: Historical change in Middle-earth languages over time.

name: Introduction to Inter-species Diplomacy
description: Fundamentals of alliances, treaties, and negotiations among races of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The Council of Elrond
lessons.description: Case study in multi-species political cooperation.

lessons.name: Treaties and Pacts
lessons.description: Key historic alliances and their terms.

lessons.name: Conflict Mediation Strategies
lessons.description: Approaches to resolving tension and war.

name: Leadership and Power Structures
description: Analysis of leadership styles among Wizards, Elves, Men, and Dwarves.

lessons.name: Leadership in Gondor and Rohan
lessons.description: Kingship and stewardship models.

lessons.name: Wizard Influence and Diplomacy
lessons.description: Gandalf and Saruman's roles in shaping alliances.

lessons.name: Elvish Councils and Wisdom
lessons.description: Decision-making in Rivendell and Lothlórien.

name: Historical Conflicts and Resolutions
description: Exploration of key wars and peace efforts in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The War of the Ring
lessons.description: Causes, alliances, and outcomes.

lessons.name: The Last Alliance of Elves and Men
lessons.description: Analysis of a critical union in Middle-earth history.

lessons.name: Post-war Diplomacy
lessons.description: How peace was rebuilt after major conflicts.
